member.name: T:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior
member.summary: This behavior/attached property causes all of the text in the textbox to be automatically selected when the user tabs into the control. Optionally, it also selects the text when the user clicks on it with the mouse.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior.OnMouseClick
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether select all occurs on mouse click.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior.OnAttached
member.summary: Called after the behavior is attached to an AssociatedObject.
member.remarks: Override this to hook up functionality to the AssociatedObject.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior.OnDetaching
member.summary: Called when the behavior is being detached from its AssociatedObject, but before it has actually occurred.
member.remarks: Override this to unhook functionality from the AssociatedObject.

member.name: F:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior.IsEnabledProperty
member.summary: Backing field for the IsEnabled property

member.name: F:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior.SelectOnMouseClickProperty
member.summary: Backing field for the SelectOnMouseClick property

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior.GetIsEnabled(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Getter for the IsEnabled property.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior.GetSelectOnMouseClick(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Getter for the SelectOnMouseClick property.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior.SetIsEnabled(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Setter for the IsEnabled property.
member.param: if set to true to enable this behavior.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.SelectAllTextBoxBehavior.SetSelectOnMouseClick(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Setter for the SelectOnMouseClick property.
member.param: if set to true to enable select all on-mouse clicks.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.Converters.DelegateConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Modifies the source data before passing it to the target for display in the UI.
member.param: The source data being passed to the target.
The of data expected by the target dependency property.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
member.returns: The value to be passed to the target dependency property.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.Converters.DelegateConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Modifies the target data before passing it to the source object. This method is called only in bindings.
member.param: The target data being passed to the source.
The of data expected by the source object.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
member.returns: The value to be passed to the source object.

member.name: T:Tortuga.Sails.Converters.DictionaryConverter
member.summary: This performs a dictionary lookup for conversion. The IDictionary is passed as the converter parameter. Convert goes from Key-->Value. ConvertBack goes from Value-->Key using the first matching value. If a key/value isn't found in the dictionary then default(targetType) is returned. If the value parameter is null then default(targetType) is returned.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.Converters.DictionaryConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value.
member.param: Will return Default(targetType) if the value is null or not found in the dictionary
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.Converters.DictionaryConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value.
member.param: Will return Default(targetType) if the value is null or not found in the dictionary
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.name: T:Tortuga.Sails.Converters.FalseToVisibleConverter
member.summary: Use this converter to show a control when the bound value is false. Null/true will hide the control. For WPF, the parameter is used to choose between Collapsed and Hidden. The default is Collapsed.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Sails.Converters.FalseToVisibleConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value.
member.param: Visibility to use when the bound value is true or null.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.
